title: Login Bypass
description:
A login form uses this SQL query on the server:

```sql
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = '$user' AND password = '$pass'
```

What input would you enter in the username field to bypass authentication?

Submit the classic SQL injection payload as the flag: flag{payload_here}
(Use the simplest single-quote based bypass)
hints: The input is inserted directly into the SQL query
What happens if you close the string early with a single quote?
Make the WHERE clause always true
